Package lt.viko.eif.esemasko.soap.soap.student

Class MoviesRepository

java.lang.Object
lt.viko.eif.esemasko.soap.soap.student.MoviesRepository
@Component public class MoviesRepository extends Object
MoviesRepository class representing a repository for storing movies and related data.

      Finds a movie by its title.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the movie with the specified title, or null if no such movie exists

      Finds movies by genre.
      Parameters:
      genreName - the name of the genre to search for
      Returns:
      a list of movie titles belonging to the specified genre

      public List<Actor> getMovieActors(String movieTitle)
      Returns a list of actors for a movie with the given title.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - the title of the movie for which to retrieve the actors
      Returns:
      a list of actors in the specified movie

    • addDirector

      public boolean addDirector(String movieTitle, Director director)
      Adds a director to the movie with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - the title of the movie to add the director to
      director - the director to be added
      Returns:
      true if the director was added successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteActor

      public boolean deleteActor(int movieId, int actorId)
      Deletes an actor from the movie with the specified movieId.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie from which to delete the actor
      actorId - the ID of the actor to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the actor was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • changeActorData

      public Actor changeActorData(int actorId, Actor actorData)
      Changes the data of the actor with the specified actorId.
      Parameters:
      actorId - the ID of the actor to be changed
      actorData - the new data for the actor
      Returns:
      the updated actor, or null if the actor was not found

    • addReview

      public boolean addReview(int movieId, int userId, int rating, String criticism)
      Adds a review for the movie with the specified movieId.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to add the review to
      userId - the ID of the user who wrote the review
      rating - the rating given by the user
      criticism - the user's criticism of the movie
      Returns:
      true if the review was added successfully, false otherwise

    • getAverageRating

      public double getAverageRating(String movieTitle)
      Returns average rating of a movie with a given title.
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - the title of the movie to get the rating from
      Returns:
      average rating of a movie if movie found successfully, returns 0 otherwise

    • addMovie

      public boolean addMovie(Movie movie)
      Adds a new movie to movies repository.
      Parameters:
      movie - a movie to be added
      Returns:
